3: Nanami, what do we do now...?
Ever since the angry bear model and his supporters left, Nanami has been as still as a rock. Feeling like an eternity has passed, Martin decides to pat Nanami on her shoulder.
WA, HA, HA ,HA!
...What are you on again, Nanami...
This! Helps me! Get my! Spirits up!
Alright. Guess we're still trying to make peace, then?
Of course! You can't stop Nanami with a big ol' reason stick or a ten episode backstory! Nanami wants something done—she gets it done!
...I get where the bionics were coming from. But it just ain't right fighting in this place! Not to mention the Corrupted!
Punishing Virus, huh... We bionics don't really know what's going on about it.
The bionics rarely come into contact with the Corrupted. Even if knowledge of the virus exists in their databanks, their experience tells them that it is nothing to be feared.
You'll be deader than a linguine if the virus gets hold of you! That's even ickier stuff than Amberia's mind control or whatever!
...Which means we should catch up to those who just left, right? Or do we go find the Corrupted instead?
Hmm... It'd take too long. Nanami is going with her original plan!
At this, Nanami looks around the settlement. Finally finding a suitable Nanami-rock, she climbs atop and uses it as a pedestal.
Ahem! Bionics of Nanarmy! Lookie here!
What on earth is a Nanarmy?!
Yeah?
Nanami's order draws the attention of all the bionics.
Ol' Martin here's hit his head and forgotten the whereabouts of Amberia, but y'all here must know something, right?!
Yeah. We do... And?
I'm gonna go convince Amberia to stop the bionics from attacking humans, then we can all go figure out what the Corrupted are up to!
But our mother-frame... Amberia, she's always been in a slumber. I don't even know if you can converse with her, not to mention...
Not to mention...?
We're staying behind because we're sick of fighting. But those who left were right—we feel the same anger inside.
So... you can't just ask us to work against them...
But, all the bionics are fighting for Amberia, right? If Amberia wants everyone to stop, they'll listen, yeah?
Well... Yeah...
If Nanami can't pass Amberia's diplomacy check, I'll think of another way... But now, let's get the dice rolling first!
Hearing Nanami's firm and confident tone, the bionics form a ring to discuss among themselves. Martin is dragged inside.
Shortly, Martin is pushed out.
Nanami, Amberia is sleeping in an underground place nearby! Let's go!
Huehue. Well then, Nanarmy... roll out!
